definition: Red flag city district/Hongqi district of Xinxiang city 新鄉市|新乡市[Xin1 xiang1 shi4], Henan
banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]
Red flag city district/Hongqi district of Xinxiang city 新鄉市|新乡市[Xin1 xiang1 shi4], Henan

sentences.english: The background music for the recitation is a variation of the song "Ode to Red Flag".
sentences.chinese: 《红旗颂》的变奏是诗朗诵的音乐背景。

sentences.english: The meeting also awarded some advanced units with the title of the May Fourth Red-banner Youth League and praised model young people.
sentences.chinese: 会议对市五四红旗团委等先进单位和个人进行了表彰。

sentences.english: The place to see son has red flag finally relieved.
sentences.chinese: 见儿子有了去处，文红旗终于松了口气。

sentences.english: Only such a monument can match the spirit of the Red Flag Canal displayed by Linzhou people.
sentences.chinese: 只有这样的碑才配得上林州人创造的红旗渠精神。

sentences.english: Who is there here with a bold heart? Who will plant the flag on the barricade again?
sentences.chinese: 这儿谁有胆量再把这面红旗插到街垒上去？

sentences.english: Here we are at the man-made heavenly river, the Red Flag Canal.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在是在人工天河，红旗渠畔。

sentences.english: The red flag is flying high in the Chinese Embassy in Sudan.
sentences.chinese: 中国驻苏丹大使馆，五星红旗高高飘扬。

sentences.english: The regional flag of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is a red flag with a bauhinia highlighted by five star-tipped stamens.
sentences.chinese: 香港特别行政区的区旗是五星花蕊的紫荆花红旗。

sentences.english: The tide riders surf the currents; the flags they hold up never get wet.
sentences.chinese: 弄潮儿向涛头立，手把红旗旗不湿。

sentences.english: The driver of the red car will be charged with the crime of drunk driving.
sentences.chinese: 红旗轿车的司机将被落案控以醉酒驾驶罪。

sentences.english: The red flags were riffled by the breeze.
LanGuiCheng helpless, still have to pay money every month to the red flag.
sentences.chinese: 兰贵成无奈，还是得每个月交钱给文红旗。

sentences.english: If I see too many, I’m outta here.
sentences.chinese: 如果我看到太多次红旗，就会马上离开这里。

sentences.english: The colour of the red flag has been dulled by age.
sentences.chinese: 那面红旗因年深日久而褪色了。

sentences.english: FAW's HQD Concept is a scary-looking Chinese-style Rolls-Royce Phantom!
sentences.chinese: 一气红旗盛事是一款吓人的中国版劳斯莱斯幻影。

sentences.english: The red flag flaunt in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 红旗迎风招展如何表达？

definition: banner/flag/(in Qing times) Manchu (cf. 八旗[Ba1 qi2])/administrative subdivision in inner Mongolia equivalent to 縣|县[xian4] county/CL:面[mian4]
